scripts.clickhouse:init: sleep 5 && docker exec primero-clickhouse clickhouse-client --query "CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS primero_tradefinance;" && docker exec -i primero-clickhouse clickhouse-client --database primero_tradefinance < clickhouse-init.sql
scripts.clickhouse:setup: npm run clickhouse:start && npm run clickhouse:init
scripts.trademap:schema: docker exec -i primero-clickhouse clickhouse-client --database primero_tradefinance < trademap-schema.sql
scripts.trademap:setup: pip install -r requirements-trademap.txt && npm run clickhouse:setup && npm run trademap:schema
